|                 | Doc4287903135            | Français |

| Expected Contract End Date | 2025-03-28          | English  |

#### Notice Type and Tender Status

* Notice Type: Advance Contract Award Notice
* Tender Status: Expired

#### Good and Services

* UNSPSC Code: 41113100
* UNSPSC Description: Gas analyzers and monitors
* Procurement Category: Goods and Services (GD)

#### Trade Agreements and Regions of Opportunity

* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Opportunity: Not Applicable

#### Contract Details

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contracting Entity Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5, Canada
* End User Entities: Department of the Environment (ECCC)
* End User Entities Address: 200 Boulevard Sacré-Cœur, Gatineau, QC, J8X 4C6, Canada

#### Contact Information

* Contact Name: Liao, Guo (SPAC/PSPC)
* Contact Email: guo.liao@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Notice URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17892262?extsite=MTc4OTIyNjJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

#### Tender Description

The Climate Chemistry Measurement and Research section of Environment and Climate Change Canada is seeking the supply and delivery of a highly portable analyzer for atmospheric CH4 and C2H6. The analyzer will be used for mobile surveys of methane and ethane mole fraction
